title: The Misunderstandings of a Bronze 5 Player and level 1-25 player
body:
I feel like sharing a few memories of when I was bronze 5 and brand new to league and games similar to it. 

When I used lee sin I would need to stand at a wall for 3 seconds to place a ward and jump to it

I was once in a ranked game and I noticed my wraith had been taken and only the babies were left, I thought that I was meant to leave them and I started to kill my big wolf and leave 1 of the babies, my mid laner Zed asked if I was mentally retarded or troll, I said I was trying really hard to win and was 100% serious. 

I tried to engage fights and be at the front line as ADC

I thought that if I shot the enemy adc before they shot me I would win, (basically walked into the lane and aa-ed them constantly even though I get rekt by their supp and 1v2ed)

I thought a full tank team would be a free win (cho mid, malph top, mundo adc, leona supp, sejuani jungle)

I took teleport and clarity on sona support, sometimes teleport exhaust or teleport flash

I took teleport on Ashe ADC

I rushed mobies on ADC Ashe

replies.body: i remember when i first started play lol, i used to do the 3v3 games only because i got lost on the 5v5 map the 1st time i tried it and everyone got mad, i couldnt find my way out of the jungle lol
Can we send you to one of those massive hedge mazes and hand you a camera?
that sounds like a real good time to me :D

I thought a full tank team would be a free win (cho mid, malph top, mundo adc, leona supp, sejuani jungle)

actually viable. just not that team comp....mundo ADC? seriously? sion ADC would be better.

green boots with slow reduction would be better on ashe. then she can kite people who have slows better.
nah bro, Mundo adc can farm with his q :)

and kill himself in the process....ok

sion wave clears at tower with Q, or farms AND harasses at the same time with his E.
Teleport on Ashe can work. It's Risky though.
Tbh if you are going to take teleport on an ADC it should be Vayne or Kogmaw, though 99% of the time I will take heal

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Xmzg1UNa,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-12T15:23:03.064+0000)
> Tbh if you are going to take teleport on an ADC it should be Vayne or Kogmaw, though 99% of the time I will take heal

I can't see any scenario where tp would be better on vayne of kog than it is on ashe.

fond memories of maining voli all the way from 1-23, still got screenies, he was on free rotation that week and when he dissapeared i tried leblanc and couldnt understand her so i bought him after that game and continued maining him everywhere, i'd go voli mid if i had too, good days XD
